title: Universal van der Waals physics for three cold atoms near Feshbach resonances
title_cn: 范斯瓦尔共振附近的三个冷原子的通用范德华物理学
abstract: Experimental studies with cold atoms have advanced our understanding of three-body physics, historically a fundamental yet challenging problem. This is because atomic interactions can be precisely varied in strength using magnetically tunable scattering resonances known as Feshbach resonances. Collisions near the unitarity limit, where scattering is maximum, are known to have universal aspects that are independent of short-range chemical details. Away from this limit, many quantum states are expected to be active during a three-body collision, making the collisional observables practically unpredictable. Here we predict three-body ultracold scattering rates by properly building in the pairwise van der Waals interactions plus the multi-spin properties of a tunable Feshbach resonance state characterized by known dimensionless two-body parameters. Numerically solving the Schrödinger equation then quantitatively determines three-atom collisional properties at all interaction strengths without needing adjustable parameters to fit data. Consequently, we can define a new class of van der Waals universality for cold atom three-body phenomena.
abstract_cn: 关于冷原子的实验研究提高了我们对三体物理的理解，这在历史上是一个基本但具有挑战性的问题。这是因为可以使用称为Feshbach共振的磁性可调散射共振来精确改变原子相互作用的强度。众所周知，靠近统一性极限（最大散射）的碰撞具有与短程化学细节无关的通用方面。超出此限制，预计三体碰撞期间许多量子态将处于活动状态，从而使碰撞可观观测值几乎不可预测。在这里，我们通过适当地建立成对的范德华相互作用以及以已知的无量纲二体参数为特征的可调Feshbach共振状态的多旋特性，来预测三体超冷散射速率。然后，通过数值求解Schr＆＃246; dinger方程，可以定量确定所有相互作用强度下的三原子碰撞特性，而无需调整参数即可拟合数据。因此，我们可以为冷原子三体现象定义一类新的范德华通用性。

title: Quantum criticality of topological phase transitions in three-dimensional interacting electronic systems
title_cn: 三维相互作用电子系统中拓扑相变的量子临界性
abstract: Topological phase transitions in condensed matter systems accompany emerging singularities of the electronic wavefunction, often manifested by gap-closing points in momentum space. In conventional topological insulators in three dimensions, the low-energy theory near the gap-closing point can be described by relativistic Dirac fermions coupled to the long-range Coulomb interaction; hence, the quantum critical point of topological phase transitions provides a promising platform to test the intriguing predictions of quantum electrodynamics. Here we discover a class of quantum critical phenomena in topological materials for which either the inversion symmetry or time-reversal symmetry can be broken. At the quantum critical point, the emerging low-energy fermions, dubbed the anisotropic Weyl fermions, show both relativistic and Newtonian dynamics simultaneously. The interplay between the anisotropic dispersion and the Coulomb interaction brings about a screening phenomenon distinct from the conventional Thomas–Fermi screening in metals and logarithmic screening in Dirac fermions.
abstract_cn: 凝聚态系统中的拓扑相变伴随着电子波函数的新兴奇点，通常表现为动量空间中的间隙闭合点。在三维的常规拓扑绝缘子中，可以通过相对论性的狄拉克费米子与远距离库仑相互作用耦合来描述靠近间隙闭合点的低能理论。因此，拓扑相变的量子临界点提供了一个有前途的平台，可以测试量子电动力学的有趣预测。在这里，我们发现了拓扑材料中的一类量子临界现象，可以打破其反转对称性或时间反转对称性。在量子临界点，被称为各向异性韦尔费米子的新兴低能费米子同时表现出相对论和牛顿动力学。各向异性分散体和库仑相互作用之间的相互作用导致了不同于传统的金属托马斯·费米筛查和狄拉克费米子对数筛查的筛查现象。

title: Observation of two-orbital spin-exchange interactions with ultracold SU(N)-symmetric fermions
title_cn: 超冷SU（N）对称费米子的两轨道自旋交换相互作用的观察
abstract: Spin-exchanging interactions govern the properties of strongly correlated electron systems such as many magnetic materials. When orbital degrees of freedom are present, spin exchange between different orbitals often dominates, leading to the Kondo effect, heavy fermion behaviour or magnetic ordering. Ultracold ytterbium or alkaline-earth ensembles have attracted much recent interest as model systems for these effects, with two (meta-) stable electronic configurations representing independent orbitals. We report the observation of spin-exchanging contact interactions in a two-orbital SU(N)-symmetric quantum gas realized with fermionic 173Yb. We find strong inter-orbital spin exchange by spectroscopic characterization of all interaction channels and demonstrate SU(N = 6) symmetry within our measurement precision. The spin-exchange process is also directly observed through the dynamic equilibration of spin imbalances between ensembles in separate orbitals. The realization of an SU(N)-symmetric two-orbital Hubbard Hamiltonian opens the route to quantum simulations with extended symmetries and with orbital magnetic interactions, such as the Kondo lattice model.
abstract_cn: 自旋交换相互作用控制着强相关电子系统（例如许多磁性材料）的特性。当存在轨道自由度时，不同轨道之间的自旋交换通常占主导地位，从而导致近藤效应，沉重的费米子行为或磁序。作为这些效果的模型系统，超冷或碱土金属乐团吸引了许多关注，它们具有代表独立轨道的两个（亚）稳定电子构型。我们报告了在用铁离子 173 Yb实现的两轨道SU（N）对称量子气体中自旋交换接触相互作用的观察结果。我们通过所有相互作用通道的光谱表征发现了强烈的轨道间自旋交换，并在我们的测量精度范围内证明了SU（N = 6）对称性。通过动态平衡各个轨道中各个合奏之间的自旋不平衡，也可以直接观察到自旋交换过程。 SU（N）对称的两轨道Hubbard哈密顿量的实现为具有扩展对称性和轨道磁相互作用的量子模拟（例如Kondo晶格模型）开辟了道路。

title: Erratum: Hierarchy of Hofstadter states and replica quantum Hall ferromagnetism in graphene superlattices
title_cn: 勘误表：石墨烯超晶格中的霍夫施塔特状态层次和副本量子霍尔铁磁性
